analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/7/0x632a9dc767860d3ba86f2ac6575bac51402b9afa.sol:
	Contract EVATOKEN has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/7/0x632a9dc767860d3ba86f2ac6575bac51402b9afa.sol#206-207)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/7/0x632a9dc767860d3ba86f2ac6575bac51402b9afa.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/7/0x632a9dc767860d3ba86f2ac6575bac51402b9afa.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/7/0x632a9dc767860d3ba86f2ac6575bac51402b9afa.sol#76-77) is not in mixedCase
